data.eml:eml: Description of Atrocalopteryx fasciata spec. nov. from Yunnan, China (Odonata: Calopterygidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Guo-Hui, Hämäläinen, Matti, Zhang, Hao-Miao (2014): Description of Atrocalopteryx fasciata spec. nov. from Yunnan, China (Odonata: Calopterygidae). Zootaxa 3779 (3): 389-393, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3779.3.7
